heading: Earn Season 8: Belial’s Return Twitch Drops!
content: Season 8: Belial’s Return arrives on , plunging wanderers into a Sanctuary clouded by the Lord of Lies’ deception. Following launch, celebrate with to earn starting April 29, 10 a.m. PDT! Prepare for Season 8: Belial’s Return—connect your Battle.net account with your Twitch account, then watch dedicated Streamers in the Diablo IV category to earn coveted Drops. The Twitch Drops below can be earned by watching any channel in the Diablo IV category with drops enabled. Watch at least 3 hours of eligible Diablo IV content while this Twitch Drop is active to earn the Marrow of the Brute Two-Handed Sword Item Cosmetic for all your demon-slaying needs. , you can also show your support for streamers within the Diablo IV category by purchasing or gifting their channel Twitch subscriptions of any tier. To celebrate the collision of Diablo IV and Kentaro Miura’s Berserk, you can earn the otherworldly by purchasing or Gifting 1 Twitch Subscriptions. Are you ready for Season 8? We hope you enjoyed the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus is now on the 2.2.0 patch and Season 8, grabbing as much knowledge we can for Season 8 to provide you the best and Resources as always. If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
